@dev Sets the initial values for lead, stakingTaxRate, unstakingTaxRate, referralTaxAllocation,
 and minimumStakeValue.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Must have enough balance to stake"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Stake failed due to failed amount transfer."

documentation.text:
registers and creates stakes for new stakeholders
 
 deducts the registration tax and staking tax
 
 calculates refferal bonus from the registration tax and sends it to the _referrer if there is one
 
 transfers LEAD from sender's address into the smart contract
 Emits an {OnRegisterAndStake} event..

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Amount is below minimum stake value."

arguments.value: Amount is below minimum stake value.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Amount is below minimum stake value."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Must have enough balance to stake"

arguments.value: Must have enough balance to stake

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Must have enough balance to stake"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Stake failed due to failed amount transfer."

arguments.value: Stake failed due to failed amount transfer.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Stake failed due to failed amount transfer."

documentation.text:
creates stakes for already registered stakeholders
 
 deducts the staking tax from _amount inputted
 
 registers the remainder in the stakes of the sender
 Emits an {OnStake} event

removes '_amount' stakes for already registered stakeholders
 
 deducts the unstaking tax from '_amount'
 
 transfers the sum of the remainder, stake rewards and referral rewards to the sender 
 
 deregisters stakeholder if all the stakes are removed
 Emits an {OnStake} event
deregisters _stakeholder and removes address from stakeholders array

checks if _address is a registered stakeholder
 
 returns 'true' and 'id number' if stakeholder and 'false' and '0'  if not

@dev Should be callsed once on a monthly basis
 distributes tokens to the stakeholders' rewards ready for withdrawal

documentation.text:
creates stakes for already registered stakeholders
 
 deducts the staking tax from _amount inputted
 
 registers the remainder in the stakes of the sender
 Emits an {OnStake} event

removes '_amount' stakes for already registered stakeholders
 
 deducts the unstaking tax from '_amount'
 
 transfers the sum of the remainder, stake rewards and referral rewards to the sender 
 
 deregisters stakeholder if all the stakes are removed
 Emits an {OnStake} event
deregisters _stakeholder and removes address from stakeholders array

checks if _address is a registered stakeholder
 
 returns 'true' and 'id number' if stakeholder and 'false' and '0'  if not

@dev Should be callsed once on a monthly basis
 distributes tokens to the stakeholders' rewards ready for withdrawal

constructor.details: Sets the initial values for lead, stakingTaxRate, unstakingTaxRate, referralTaxAllocation, and minimumStakeValue.

distribute().details: Should be callsed once on a monthly basis distributes tokens to the stakeholders' rewards ready for withdrawal

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

registerAndStake(uint256,address).notice: registers and creates stakes for new stakeholders  deducts the registration tax and staking tax  calculates refferal bonus from the registration tax and sends it to the _referrer if there is one  transfers LEAD from sender's address into the smart contract Emits an {OnRegisterAndStake} event..

stake(uint256).notice: creates stakes for already registered stakeholders  deducts the staking tax from _amount inputted  registers the remainder in the stakes of the sender Emits an {OnStake} event

unstake(uint256).notice: removes '_amount' stakes for already registered stakeholders  deducts the unstaking tax from '_amount'  transfers the sum of the remainder, stake rewards and referral rewards to the sender   deregisters stakeholder if all the stakes are removed Emits an {OnStake} event
